title: wepay
author: wepay
content: 🚀 Exciting News for the Bitcoin Community! 🌟Introducing the We Pay APP, now available on Google Store! 💰📱Are you a Bitcoin enthusiast looking to boost your earnings? Look no further! We Pay APP offers you the perfect opportunity to earn money and rewards while staying in the crypto world.🌐 Join us to:1️⃣ Earn Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.2️⃣ Complete simple tasks and surveys.3️⃣ Exchange your earnings for Bitcoin!4️⃣ Be part of a growing community of like-minded individuals.Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity. Download now and start earning while embracing the world of Bitcoin! 📥💸Get started today: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.reward.wepayLooking for an easy way to boost your income and embrace the world of cryptocurrencies? Check out We Pay APP, now available on Google Store!🌟 Discover us at: https://xwepay.com/💬 Questions or inquiries? Email us at: admin@xwepay.com📢 Join the conversation on Telegram: https://t.me/xwepay📸 Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/xwepay🎥 Watch our latest updates on YouTube: https://shorturl.at/mqIL9🐦 Stay tuned for news and announcements on Twitter: https://twitter.com/xwepayJoin our community and start earning today! 💰💡#WePayApp #BitcoinEarnings #CryptoCommunity #GoogleStoreLaunch #EarnBitcoin #Binance #Coinbase #CryptoEarnings

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: It is better to move this topic to ----> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=84.0I do not think that you will find enough downloads, as everyone here is skeptical and will not carry a closed source application, but this drives me to ask, why is there no possibility to earn a site? Isn't Simple Tasks and Surveys, what is the role of the application here?How much is the profit that the individual can get by running the application 3 hours per day, and what are the necessary permissions?

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: I've checked your website and you claims that the app has been downloaded 1k times or used by 1k users, but your Play Store statistic don't show the same thing. Where do the stats come from? Is there a beta app or something? Personally, I don't feel comfortable using an app from a developer that use fake apps.

comments.author: wepay
comments.body: 🚀 Join our We Pay App Beta Test and earn $25! 🤑 Get a sneak peek of the future of earning money and rewards. Download now: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.reward.wepay 📲 Don't miss out on this exclusive opportunity! 💰💎 #WePayApp #BetaTest #Giveaway

comments.author: wepay
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on September 26, 2023, 06:26:01 PMIt is better to move this topic to ----> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=84.0I do not think that you will find enough downloads, as everyone here is skeptical and will not carry a closed source application, but this drives me to ask, why is there no possibility to earn a site? Isn't Simple Tasks and Surveys, what is the role of the application here?How much is the profit that the individual can get by running the application 3 hours per day, and what are the necessary permissions?Hi there,Thank you to take the time to leave a comment. I can move the thread without any problems. The App is in Beta Test for the moment with a giveaway of 25$ given to the first 3 places.We are looking to increase our exposure to advertisers at this exact moment to offer surveys, rewards with games and others but all takes a tone of time with emails and implementations. If you run the APP 1 hour at this moment you are fighting for the first 3 places on Beta Test from there onwards we looking 1$ or more per survey and 0.5$ hour watching videos. As I mention we are in early phase and looking to expand with more users to get the best deals.Regarding the permissions I did not understood the question.One more time thank you your support Best WP

comments.author: wepay
comments.body: Quote from: joniboini on September 27, 2023, 01:31:43 AMI've checked your website and you claims that the app has been downloaded 1k times or used by 1k users, but your Play Store statistic don't show the same thing. Where do the stats come from? Is there a beta app or something? Personally, I don't feel comfortable using an app from a developer that use fake apps. Hi there and thank you to take your time to check the website.We are in Beta Test and after your post I have updated the numbers. Thank you for the supportBestWP

comments.author: wepay
comments.body: 🚀 Exciting news! We Pay App has hit 250 downloads on Google Play Store! 📱💰 Join the growing community of earners and start making money and earning rewards today! Don't miss out, download now: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.reward.wepay#WePayApp #EarnMoney #DownloadNow

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: What is the business model of your app.You say you pay people rewards through surveys, videos, games, advertisements etc. I don't see how this is sustainable unless you have a sufficient source of revenue. How do you earn revenue?Also, your site has a lot of typos, please check and correct.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: wepay on October 01, 2023, 09:02:22 PMHi there and thank you to take your time to check the website.We are in Beta Test and after your post I have updated the numbers. Thank you for the supportWhich beta test are you referring to? Are you saying that the website is still in beta hence why it doesn't grab data from Playstore accordingly? I checked just now and it seems the download numbers are more or less believable compared to before. Not sure how to check the others though. At least it is not as sketchy as before. It still doesn't give me any confidence though. Just my 2 cents.

comments.author: wepay
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 02, 2023, 09:45:38 PMWhat is the business model of your app.You say you pay people rewards through surveys, videos, games, advertisements etc. I don't see how this is sustainable unless you have a sufficient source of revenue. How do you earn revenue?Also, your site has a lot of typos, please check and correct.Hi there,The business model is the same as other cash Apps.Use monetization services and allow advertisers in the APP, soo I can get pay keeping around 25% to We Pay for developments and others.What u mean by typos?Many thanks for supporting the projectWP

comments.author: wepay
comments.body: Quote from: joniboini on October 03, 2023, 01:16:40 AMQuote from: wepay on October 01, 2023, 09:02:22 PMHi there and thank you to take your time to check the website.We are in Beta Test and after your post I have updated the numbers. Thank you for the supportWhich beta test are you referring to? Are you saying that the website is still in beta hence why it doesn't grab data from Playstore accordingly? I checked just now and it seems the download numbers are more or less believable compared to before. Not sure how to check the others though. At least it is not as sketchy as before. It still doesn't give me any confidence though. Just my 2 cents.The Beta test is until final of the month. We will share 25$ for the first 3 places instead of paying the coins earned since we still finding out what would be the ration coin/$. The numbers in the website are matching 100% the numbers on the backend. Proof can be given.Many thanks for all the kind supportBestWP

comments.author: wepay
comments.body: Exciting news! We Pay App has teamed up with Vungle to bring you an even more rewarding experience. 🤑📺 Now, earn money and rewards like never before with our new video wall feature. Start earning today!💰💎

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: wepay on October 03, 2023, 06:39:49 AMWhat u mean by typos?I mean, your site contains a number of typing errors and incorrect grammar. You might want to correct them to make it look more professional. Here are a few examplesQuoteAt WE PAY earn money rewards trough surveys, videos, games, advertisements and many other ways…Perhaps you meant throughQuoteWe all spend allot of time online why not converted in to real money. Perhaps you meant a lotQuoteYour opinion is in high demand.Perhaps you meant on high demandQuoteWith thousand of users around the World We PAY community thrives and leads the top earning apps in the WorldYou have only 240 active users so far. So that's hundreds of users, not thousands.

comments.author: wepay
comments.body: Thank you so much to take your time to review the Website. Everything was adjusted as recommended. Is people like you that make us dream on making this App a TOP AppBest WP

comments.author: Text
comments.body: I am currently trying to use and test your app, and I noticed a few things right away. It seems you forgot to include your app's official social media profiles, such as YouTube and Facebook, on your website. I'm currently doing daily missions, and the shortened link to your YouTube channel is not hyperlinked, so I had to manually type it into the URL address to subscribe. As for attaching a screenshot for proof, there is no confirmation whether the photo was successfully attached or not.The same issue applies to Facebook, where it just mentions liking your Facebook page and leaving a comment, but there is no link provided, and I'm not sure where to leave the comment.That's all for now.See the attached screenshots below.

comments.author: wepay
comments.body: Quote from: Text on October 03, 2023, 10:10:28 PMI am currently trying to use and test your app, and I noticed a few things right away. It seems you forgot to include your app's official social media profiles, such as YouTube and Facebook, on your website. I'm currently doing daily missions, and the shortened link to your YouTube channel is not hyperlinked, so I had to manually type it into the URL address to subscribe. As for attaching a screenshot for proof, there is no confirmation whether the photo was successfully attached or not.The same issue applies to Facebook, where it just mentions liking your Facebook page and leaving a comment, but there is no link provided, and I'm not sure where to leave the comment.That's all for now.See the attached screenshots below.https://talkimg.com/images/2023/10/03/Pg7bd.jpeghttps://talkimg.com/images/2023/10/03/PgBH5.jpeghttps://talkimg.com/images/2023/10/03/Pggsz.jpegHi there,Thank you to take your time to review our APP.If you look on our website https://xwepay.com/ you can see the Youtube and Facebook Links.Regarding the daily missions I just fixed it.Many thanks for all the supportWP
